mapper.select: select IFNULL(MAX(privateperms),0) from perms where docid=#{docid} and userid=#{userid}
select IFNULL(MAX(teamperms),0) from teammember where teamid=#{teamid} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update perms set privateperms=#{privateperms} where docid=#{docid} and userid=#{userid}
update teammember set teamperms=#{teamperms} where teamid=#{teamid} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from perms where docid=#{docid} and userid = #{userid}
delete from perms where teamid=#{teamid} and userid = #{userid}
